node.title: Freelance website designer in kalyan
node.content:
Hi folks,

Are you looking for a trusted reliable freelance web designer near by you in Ambarnath, Kalyan, Badlapur, Ulhasnagar?

Your search end here for Freelance Website Designer in Kalyan.

Hi, I am Durgesh Gupta and I design beautiful websites, from simple static website to complex e-commerce website I deliver you world class website at affordable rate.

How to get started?

  1. Simply click contact me on whatsapp or can call me on my mobile number +91-99100-99645
  2. Share your project requirement with me.
  3. Get relevant quotation in your budget.
  4. As soon we agreed on commercial term you can now forward your content or can ask me to write content for you.
  5. I will build and share with you some initial designed pages and if you like it I will go ahead and design remaining web pages.
  6. I will share you the final website before launch and after your feedback, suggestion or changes we can put the website live.

Website Designing and Beyond

Apart from website designing, I also provide services for web and mobile application development i.e. ERP, CRM, School management application, HR management application etc. I also do SEO, Social Media, Digital Marketing i.e. Facebook Ads, Google Ads etc.

Contact Freelance Web Designer in Kalyan

Durgesh Gupta
Call/Whatsapp: +91-99100-99645
Website: https://durgeshgupta.com/contact

node.title: Draftbox – build headless Gatsbyjs blog
node.content:
Draftbox is an emerging service to build headless blog in Gatsbyjs

How does it work?

To build your blog Draftbox gives you option to select your data source either form WordPress (both cloud and self-hosted supported ) or Ghost platform once you select it also offer you prebuilt Gatsbyjs theme for frontend user interface and build the blog for you and host it to your Netlify service account.

A blazing fast Gatsbyjs theme

Draftbox offer you super fast rich Gatsbyjs theme to display your blog posts beautifully.
